title: Basic html datetime-local input test
description: A basic html datetime-local input test.

narrator.edge: unable to change the value without using the date picker widget

chrome.output: input was not focused
input was not found
unable to get to the control
input was not recognized
"12, date time, edit"
chrome.notes: each part of the date (month, day, and year) is rendered as its own control, and you can navigate between controls with arrow keys

results.notes: implied by reading order

results.notes: for example, if you press "up arrow" or "down arrow" on any of the embedded spin boxes

chrome.output: embedded controls and grid are accessible.

was able to open the date picker but not interact with any elements in the date picker. was unable to set the value for embedded controls such as the year by saying "numeral 1955", however "up arrow" and "down arrow" adjusted the values.

results.notes: partial because it was still possible to use some of the controls and enter a date
